GPSC-R.BK.long_name: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
GPSC-R.BK.summary: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the production and distribution of electricity, steam, and water for industrial purpose in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Independent Power Producer, Small Power Producer, and Others. It generates electricity through solar, hydropower, and cogeneration power plants. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

RATCH-R.BK.summary: Ratch Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity in Thailand, Australia, and internationally. It operates through Domestic Electricity Generating, Renewable Energy, and International Power Projects segments. The company generates electricity through natural gas, coal, and fuel oil, as well as solar power, wind power, and biomass renewable projects. As of December 31, 2019, it had a total installed capacity of 8,655.07 megawatts. Ratch Group Public Company Limited also provides power plant operation and maintenance services, as well as invests in the power energy business. The company was formerly known as Ratchaburi Electricity Generating Holding Public Company Limited and changed its name to Ratch Group Public Company Limited in April 2019. Ratch Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.

SCG-R.BK.summary: Sahacogen (Chonburi) Public Company Limited produces and distributes electricity and steam in Thailand. It operates a cogeneration power plant with a capacity to produce 214 megawatts of electricity and 96 tons of steam per hour. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
